Harry Hurwitz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Hurwitz 0 Harry Hurwitz (January 27, 1938 – September 21, 1995) was an American film director, screenwriter, actor and producer. Harry Hurwitz ( January_27_,_1938 – September_21_,_1995 ) was an_American_film_director , screenwriter , actor_and_producer .
